events.text: Saul becomes the first king of Israel
David reigns and unites the kingdom
Solomon builds the temple in Jerusalem
The kingdom divides into Israel and Judah
Various kings lead Israel and Judah into sin or reform
Prophets call the nations to repentance
Assyria conquers the northern kingdom of Israel
Judah continues with righteous and wicked kings
Jerusalem and the temple are destroyed
The people of Judah are carried into exile in Babylon
